018package com.github.tommyettinger.kryo.libgdx;
019
020import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
021import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo;
022import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer;
023import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Input;
024import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Output;
025
026/**
027 * Kryo {@link Serializer} for libGDX {@link Affine2}s.
028 */
029public class Affine2Serializer extends Serializer<Affine2> {
030
031    public Affine2Serializer() {
032        setImmutable(false);
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public void write(final Kryo kryo, final Output output, final Affine2 data) {
037        output.writeFloat(data.m00);
038        output.writeFloat(data.m01);
039        output.writeFloat(data.m02);
040        output.writeFloat(data.m10);
041        output.writeFloat(data.m11);
042        output.writeFloat(data.m12);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public Affine2 read(final Kryo kryo, final Input input, final Class<? extends Affine2> dataClass) {
047        Affine2 data = new Affine2();
048        data.m00 = input.readFloat();
049        data.m01 = input.readFloat();
050        data.m02 = input.readFloat();
051        data.m10 = input.readFloat();
052        data.m11 = input.readFloat();
053        data.m12 = input.readFloat();
054        return data;
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public Affine2 copy(Kryo kryo, Affine2 original) {
059        return new Affine2(original);
060    }
061}
